item.title: Math and Coding Camps in Charlottesville | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Morning Camps Ages 6 to 10: Come to learn to code using Scratch or Coffee Script, build Lego® robots and solve math puzzles! The activities do not repeat; students may join us for one, two, or all three weeks! Session 1: 9 am to 1 pm, July 24th to July 28th (2 spots remaining) Session 2: 9 am to 1 pm, July 31st to August 4th (2 spots remaining) Session 3: 9 am to 1 pm, August 7th to August 11th (Full) Click here for daily schedule and activities!
